channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - October 9, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-october-9-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Brindlewood Bay_ * _Brinkwood: Refuge_ * _Fate of Cthulhu_ * _Flotsam_ * _Heart_ * _Impulse Drive_ * _Masks_ * _Offworlders_ * _Shattered City_ * _Teenage Nightmare_ * _Teens in Space_ * _The Pack_ * _This Party Sucks_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
